title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a severed hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and what does it indicate?

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of dreams in a dream according to leading translators and scholars, cutting off an arm and a leg from a corrupt conflict. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a severed hand in a dream, detailed interpretation of dreams about the hand in a dream according to the best Arab translators and scholars, and it is one of the dreams that causes fear and panic, and therefore they often search for the most important indicators. Below we see the interpretation of the dream of seeing a severed hand in a dream differs from one person to another. Is this dream good or bad? Interpretation of the dream of seeing a severed hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a severed hand in a dream indicates difficulties, distress, and financial difficulties. There is a lot of money and we will discuss it in detail. Hand in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a cut off hand. Seeing a cut off hand indicates problems, family disputes, and distance from God. Because seeing a cut off hand in a dream can be one of the dreams that is considered very disturbing, because it causes the dreamer a lot of anxiety and fear, and this topic can push him to search Some evidence or some interpretations that this disturbs the interpretation of this vision has been reported by many translators and many jurists as well, and this vision usually expresses the severing of relations between brothers or it may also predict the severing of a man’s lineage or it may be the severing of a woman’s lineage but it could It may also be an expression of money or a lot of livelihood, and the interpretation of this varies depending on what he saw in his dream or according to God. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off Ibn Sirin’s hand: The dream indicates that he left prayer or cutting off the arm in the dream has many signs and meanings that differ from one person to another. Ibn Sirin explained that he saw a hand cut off in a dream during a trial. Seeing a man’s hand cut off in a dream also indicates that he is cutting off his lineage, which means that he cannot have children. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off fingers in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi in detail. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a hand from Palm: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a hand: A hand in a dream shows abandonment and a man who disagrees with corruption in religion. Interpretation of seeing a cut off hand: Seeing a dreamer cutting off his hand in a dream is a sign of goodness that will happen soon. Seeing a traveler whose hand was cut off by his mother in a dream means that he has returned from traveling. Cutting off the hand from the palm indicates that the dreamer abandoned prayer, swore, or stole. See also : Interpretation of dreams about seeing fingers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about a severed hand. A dream about a person cutting off his hand. In a dream, a dream about a severed hand in a dream in detail: Seeing a severed hand in a dream indicates separation between loved ones and close people and separation between spouses or fiancés. As for seeing a hand severed from behind, it indicates Evidence of corruption and committing misdeeds and sins. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off the left hand. Cutting off the left hand in a dream, cutting off the hand in a dream, interpretation of dreams. As for someone who dreams of cutting off his left hand, this indicates the death of his brother or sister. Seeing the left hand cut off indicates separation between brothers and relatives. Seeing A man as if his wife cut off his hands is a sign of separation. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about

title: Interpretation of seeing a calm and pure sea according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the calm and serenity of the sea, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. The sea is a natural security in which a person can release a lot of his negative energies, get rid of tension, and think calmly. Being in the sea has been associated with many psychological problems. Dreams in which the sea appears are beautiful dreams, but at the same time they cause confusion, especially if the shape of the sea is irregular. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a calm and clear sea according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calm and clear sea in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a calm and clear sea indicates the state of psychological calm that the dreamer enjoys and the comfort and tranquility that overwhelms him. If the married dreamer sees this vision In a dream, this vision expresses the state of stability of marital life and the happiness he enjoys with his wife and children. As for the unmarried person, this vision is a vision that promises him goodness and happiness, as it indicates marriage to a good girl with good morals. If the dreamer sees that he is drowning in the sea He cannot survive, as this vision is repulsive and indicates the emergence of major problems in the dreamer’s life that he cannot face. As for the meaning of this vision for the sick dreamer, this vision is good news for recovery from the disease, and God knows best. One of the indicators of seeing a calm and tranquil sea is that it shows kindness and abundant blue, in addition to its occupation. For a prominent position. As for bathing in the sea, this vision suggests repentance and stopping prohibitions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calm sea in a dream for a single woman: This vision for an unmarried girl indicates her relationship with a young man with high morals. For an unmarried girl, this vision portends the death of stress and sadness and the end of the problems she faces. One of the indicators of seeing a calm and clear sea is that it reflects success, excellence, and the opportunity to travel abroad. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calm sea in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this vision for a married woman, it is one of the good dreams that indicate goodness, life, and happiness, and it also indicates the birth of righteous children. Seeing her swimming in the sea symbolizes her desire to achieve the goals she seeks. As for bathing in it, it is evidence of repentance from committing sins and disobedience. If you see her drowning in sea water, this vision indicates the crises that she is actually experiencing. But if she sees that she is drinking from sea water, then this dream represents a reflection of the stable state of marital life that she enjoys. It also represents good news for her that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Best.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calm and clear sea for a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this vision for a pregnant woman, it is facilitating childbirth, and if she sees herself drinking sea water, then this vision means goodness and livelihood, and is represented by a large amount of money. For a pregnant woman, this vision also indicates The fulfillment of desires and also expresses the problems that a pregnant woman faces. Seeing a bath with sea water in a dream symbolizes her attempt to preserve the health of her fetus, and God knows best. There are many details that accompany seeing sea water.

Seeing a bath with seawater in a dream symbolizes her attempt to maintain the health of her fetus, and God knows best. There are many details that accompany the vision of the sea

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a big black snake?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large black snake: The snake is considered one of the most harmful creatures that a person does not feel happy at all when he sees it and panics greatly when he notices it. Dreaming about it raises doubts in the minds of dreamers because of its effects on them, and this article is an explanation of the most important interpretations that will interest many people and facilitate the search for them. Interpretation of a dream about a big black snake. The dreamer’s vision of a big black beard in a dream indicates that he discovered that someone close to him had been deceived and his relationship with him was permanently severed, and that he felt extreme remorse for the complete trust he had placed in him, and that a person’s dream of a long black beard during his sleep is evidence of... He is surrounded by many hypocrites. Whoever shows him friendliness has intense hatred and hatred towards him and he must be careful in dealing with it because it can cause him. Great harm. If the dreamer sees the big black snake in his dream, this is a sign that he is facing a very dangerous enemy in his life, but he is doing his best not to harm him and to be able to overcome him. A person sees in a dream that he has managed to kill a big black snake, so this is a sign that he will triumph over those who wish him harm. Interpretation of a dream about a big black snake by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a person’s dream of the presence of a big black snake in a dream as a sign of the presence of someone hiding behind him in secret. He waits for the appropriate opportunity to strike and harm him, and he must pay attention to the upcoming movements so as not to harm his enemies, even if the dreamer sees during his sleep that he can kill the big black snake, which expresses his success in overcoming many of the obstacles that were in his way and that greatly disturbed his life. In the event that The dreamer saw in his dream the big black snake. This is one of the dreams that carries warning meanings for him, that he will soon be exposed to many unpleasant events in his life, and he must be patient with sadness and show determination and strength to be able to pass this period well, and the black snake can symbolize it. The old man in a man’s dream turns into a disreputable lady who hovers around him to make him fall into obscenity and cause him a lot of trouble. Interpretation of a dream about a big black snake according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interprets the dreamer who sees a big black beard in a dream and is not afraid of it as evidence that he has a high degree of self-confidence and ability. To overcome difficulties. He is a sworn enemy and will take a lot of his property as a result, and if one dreams of the death of a big black snake, this is a sign that he will get rid of many things that caused him great discomfort. If the dreamer sees in his dream a big black snake and eats it, this is evidence that he will collect a lot of money Of his work in the coming period and if he sees the dreamer alive. And he is killed in his bed, as this may indicate his approaching separation from his wife, and his intense sadness for her. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a large black snake for a single woman. It shows an unmarried woman seeing a beard.

title: Learn more about the interpretation of the name Ali in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of the name Ali during sleep: A person sees many dreams and visions in his dreams, some of which have good interpretations, and some have dreams that carry difficult interpretations, and the name Ali in a dream is one of the visions that many people dream of, and since this name means high and wonderful. Sublime, most of its interpretations in the vision are positive, and here are the most prominent interpretations of a dream with the name Ali through the following. The name Ali in a dream Seeing the name Ali in a dream is one of the good visions in its interpretation, because it indicates the greatness of the dreamer’s position in society, and the jurists confirmed that the name Ali in a man’s dream means God gives him a great position in Islam, and he has a word that Muslims respect, because his abundance of knowledge will make everyone listen to him, and many will consult him on matters of their religion until they come from him with sound legal advice without falsehood. When the dreamer dreams that his name is Ali, this means that he is a person known for his honor and adherence to principles. Which he was raised on, no matter what happens in his life he will never change and will continue the teachings. From his religion, this dream means that the dreamer will not submit to the refuge of the world and will choose to always be with God. If the dreamer is subjected to humiliation and humiliation by others as a result of his need for money in reality and he sees in his dream the name of Ali written in front of him in a bright hand, the interpretation is that the dreamer will make him greater than those who They insulted and despised his weak abilities due to his need... and the good news is that he should wait for his position to be established and he will be freed from the womb of suffering due to God’s mercy and help soon. If the dreamer is sick in reality and all the doctors have not cured him until he despairs and stops looking for a cure for him and sees in his dream that there is an old man wearing white clothes Clean and elegant and entered his home carrying gifts or delicious food, this dream interprets that God is able to heal anyone, no matter how sick he is, and the dreamer will be impressed by his recovery in reality soon. When the dreamer dreams that he is standing in front of the grave of our master Ali and is surprised that the visitors to the shrine are prostrating to themselves as if they are worshiping Imam Ali instead of God, this dream expresses an imminent disturbance that will occur in... The state and the will are a disturbance in faith and will shake the people of the country from believing in their religion, so this dream is interpreted as a great disturbance that will overwhelm the country and its people. If the dreamer dreams of seeing Imam Ali in front of him and verifying the features of his face, then this dream warns the dreamer that he is among those whom God accepts, and that All his prayers are counted for him and the degree of his faith is. He grows from what he was and his heart is filled with love for God. Whoever sees Imam Ali in a dream, the interpretation is complete that the dreamer has chosen asceticism, isolation, and abandonment of worldly pleasures and forbidden desires. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Seeing a person named Ali in A single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl in reality rejects anyone who comes to her to marry her with the intention of wanting to marry a young man with a high social and financial status and she sees in her dream a person named Ali laughing at her, then this dream is interpreted. As she will marry a young man with the same specifications as she dreamed of in terms of height

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of the genie in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pound in a dream and interpretation of its meaningThe pound in a dream is one of the most promising visions of all, as it is evidence of abundant nutrition, abundance of money, happiness, joy and pleasure for the pioneer. Sometimes, seeing a pound in a dream indicates a need for money, poverty, and perhaps rich people, and other times it is evidence of the acquisition of forbidden money and a call from God to stay away from this path and earn halal profits. May God Almighty bless the livelihood of the dreamer and his family. Interpretation of a dream about a pound: If a man sees silver pounds in a dream, this is evidence of power, influence, authority, a lot of money, and a lot of sustenance. If the dreamer sees a metal pound in a dream and takes it from the ground, this is evidence of the anguish and distress that will befall him. The dreamer, and perhaps the dreamer will be afflicted with a serious disease, and if he does not catch it, it is evidence of his salvation from misfortunes, and perhaps God will keep him away from a malicious disease and escape it, and seeing a lot of coins in a dream is evidence of many problems and misfortunes that the dreamer faces and that he will solve them. Sadness and anxiety for his life. What is the interpretation of a dream about silver pounds? If a young man sees in a dream a silver pound, this is good news, and this vision is evidence that he will be blessed with a woman who is beautiful in appearance, appearance and content, with a good heart and purity, and she will protect the house and his money. When a married man sees a pound Silver in a dream and he cannot get it, this is a bad omen and evidence of poverty and that he will not be able to get money and that he will suffer from poverty for a while, and perhaps he will. Be able to overcome this problem. Interpretation of a dream about a metal fairy for a single woman: Money in an unmarried woman’s dream, if it is made of metal, is a sign that her social relationship with those close to her will be disrupted to some extent. Problems will increase at home, and she may quarrel with a friend of her boyfriend while she is awake. This quarrel ends with a quarrel between them. If an unmarried woman sees that the coins in her dream are fake and cannot be used in buying and selling operations like real money, then this is a sign that he is saying shameful things about her, whether it is because of her reputation, her morals, or her personal Zoe. In general, and to go into details that no one has the right to talk about anywhere else. Both Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin indicated that if a young man dreams that he took a pound of metal, then this is a good dream and indicates the good things that he will obtain, knowing that he only gave a little. Of effort in it. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he found a pound of metal left on the ground, this is a sign that money was not his primary concern and that he is not tempted by the lust for money or worldly pleasures in general. Through it, he will rise to higher levels in Paradise. As for seeing money in general in an unmarried woman’s dream, it has a fixed meaning in the interpretation, which is that she is an ambitious person. If an unmarried woman dreams of a group of coins and hides them from those around her, then this is a close marriage for her, with permission.

As for seeing money in general in an unmarried woman’s dream, it has a fixed meaning in the interpretation, which is that she is an ambitious person. If an unmarried woman dreams of a group of coins and hides them from those around her, then this is a close marriage for her, with permission.

title: Breastfeeding in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream may differ depending on the state of the god in whom he saw the vision, because this vision has many connotations and interpretations that we will explain to you in the following lines, so follow us. Breastfeeding in a dream Ibn Sirin says that if a girl sees herself breastfeeding and her breasts appear, then this vision is a harbinger of marriage. Close. Seeing breasts and breastfeeding in a dream for a married woman who has not given birth before due to her imminent pregnancy. Seeing the appearance of breasts and secretion of milk in a married man’s dream indicates that he is suffering from poverty and debt. If a man sees that he is breastfeeding a woman, this vision indicates that his imprisonment is imminent. In the event that A married man sees a chest and the man grows old, then the dream indicates the arrival of sad news. But if a single man sees in his dream that he is breastfeeding, then this vision is evidence of the dreamer’s desire for intercourse and marriage. If a married woman dreams that she is breastfeeding her children, the dream shows how much she loves her children. Breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the appearance of a small breast indicates that the fortuneteller is suffering from financial circumstances, but the doors of livelihood are opening for him. If a man dreams that he is drinking breast milk, this vision shows the obstacles and difficulties that he faces and he wants to get rid of them. In the event that a woman sees in Dreaming of a large amount of milk flowing from the breast, this dream heralds the arrival of nourishment. It also indicates happiness, stability, respect and mutual affection between the spouses. But if a girl sees in a dream the chest of an unmarried young man full of hair, then this vision is a sign of engagement to a young man who enjoys With power and status. Seeing a beautiful mirrored chest in a dream is a sign of achieving ambitions and goals as well as imminent happiness. Breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. According to Ibn Shaheen, the dream of breastfeeding a child in a married woman’s dream shows how much she cares for her children. But if the woman has not given birth before and sees The vision, this is evidence of the approaching pregnancy, and the satisfaction of her desires. If a man sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding her son, then this dream is good news for the fulfillment of dreams and obtaining the highest grades. If the dreamer is in debt and sees the vision in his dreams, it is a sign of paying off debts and the arrival of sustenance and blessings. And money. However, if the dreamer is an unmarried young man and sees the vision, then this is a sign of marriage to a good-looking girl. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child for a pregnant womanBreastfeeding in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding a child and is experiencing problems The vision indicates the end of problems and disputes and the beginning of a happy life. If a woman sees that she is breastfeeding her son and the breast milk increases, the dream indicates the blessing, food, and money that she will soon obtain. It also indicates the satisfaction of desires, and if her husband is a shop owner, then she will benefit from her trade. However, if a woman sees that she is breastfeeding a young child, but she is very sad, then the dream indicates the arrival of bad and sad news. When a woman dreams that her husband is breastfeeding her and is happy, the dream shows love, respect, and affection between them. The

title: Interpretation of ink in a dream “seeing an ink pen”

preview.html: Interpretation of ink in a dream by Ibn Sirin. This was confirmed by Sheikh Ibn Shirin. Confusion in a dream. Do you know? Correctly. It also indicates money and great wealth. Black ink indicates the presence of a boy in a dream. It also concluded by indicating abundance of knowledge and abundance. The meaning of seeing ink in Miller’s dream. Miller said in the Western interpretation that seeing ink means the sharpness and intelligence of the fortuneteller. As for whoever sees ink getting into clothes or wallpaper, it is an indication that the dreamer feels confused about something. See also: There is ink on the clothes. It indicates conflicts between the dreamer and others in the family. Dreaming of black ink indicates hatred, hatred, hypocrisy, and conveying obscene words from God to others. Regarding spilling black ink, it is It indicates separation and abandonment. The meaning of seeing ink in a dream for a single woman. Seeing ink in a dream for a person is a dream of praise. Who do you see? She used ink in drawing or sculpting, as it is a clear indication of her talent for creativity. As you can see, inkwell, it indicates rest, rest, and meals. Interpretation of seeing ink in a dream for a married woman indicates The ink pen in the dream of the married husband. Seeing confusion in the dream of the married woman indicates an extensive diet. It also indicates a good son. Whoever suffered from infertility or delayed birth, and you will see ink, it is a good sign of pregnancy. Blue and green ink in the dream indicates a good host. The meaning of seeing ink in A pregnant woman's dream is green ink. In a pregnant woman's dream, it is a sign of sustenance, justice, and preserving religion. Seeing blue ink indicates the birth of a male child, and that it will be a link and help to his parents. Green ink symbolizes the blessings of God Almighty on the banner. Transparent ink indicates ease of delivery. The meaning of seeing ink in a dream for a man. Blue ink in A man’s dream indicates youth and goodness. Seeing ink in a man’s dream is a sign of saving money and an investor. Seeing an inkwell and using feathers symbolizes marriage. Ink in a dream, job demands, success and above. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a cousin in a dream is that the dreams that a person sees in his sleep are nothing but signs or those that occupy his mind and what happens in his day. Personal care from them and they do not know the unseen, so my dear, when you see the interpretation of a dream and it is bad, do not be upset and do not become depressed because it is simply an uncertain possibility. Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a dream. Seeing a cousin in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a cousin in a dream It has indications for a single woman that differs from others. Seeing a cousin in a dream for a single woman. The presence of a cousin in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes her need for support and support in the crisis she is going through in order to overcome it without harming her. It also indicates that she is busy thinking about Communicating and finding a partner in life for her who loves her and makes her feel the importance of her presence. While watching her cousin die in her sleep, it appears that she is going through a state of depression because she misses someone from the family and needs to return to her Lord. On the other hand, if she sees him touching her hand and she refuses to do so, this indicates There is a husband who asked her from her family and does not want to marry him. It also indicates that there is a person in her life who cares about her and supports her, and it symbolizes her feeling of security because of this person’s support. It indicates her love for herself, achieving her goal, and her hatred for those who hate her. Also, seeing the cousin He wears poor and dirty clothes, this indicates the passing of crisis and sadness, but if she sees him in an attractive form and dress, this indicates the stability of her life. This may be a sign of what he holds in his heart for the monarch. It could also stem from what she feels for him of love or Admiration. Whereas if she saw that he was looking at her with a smile, it would be a sign of my support for her. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see cousins’ sons and daughters in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my cousin talking to me. Seeing a cousin talking to her in a dream and expressing his feelings for her indicates that this dream Evidence that she is living in a state of emotional emptiness. And that God will compensate her with those who deserve it. It also symbolizes finding a good job that will benefit them greatly. It also mentions an upcoming project about which her family will be consulted and their response will support and motivate her. On the other hand, it symbolizes the closeness of their relationship and the existence of their bond And her constant protection from every bad person around her. Interpretation of a dream about my cousin giving me the hand of a single woman. This dream for one girl indicates that she will change her life with something like a new relationship or business. Whereas if he is still studying, it symbolizes progress and excellence in the stage Which he studies. See also: Interpretation of a dream about an uncle’s marriage to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a cousin in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing men in a dream means support and protection for the pioneer, and seeing a cousin in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a cousin in a divorced woman’s dream indicates a change in her situation and her life for the better, whether scientifically or Practically or in the family. Also, if she sees him smiling at her in her dream, she will have good skin for the good things that she will soon encounter in her life. Whereas if she dreams of her cousin kissing her, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white worm: seeing white worms in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about worms in the house, in the hair, in the dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman...worms come out of the body with black food. A white worm in a dream. The young woman symbolizes the bride to whom the young man is attached, and whoever sees in his dream that he sees a white worm in front of him, this is evidence On the approaching date of his wedding. Whoever sees in a dream that white worms are scattered around him, this is a sign of relatives or friends who stand by his side in the trial he is going through or the problems he may face. A white worm in a dream is considered evidence of abundant material gains and may indicate positions Senior and important positions that the dreamer may hold. If the dreamer in the dream works in trade or industry, then seeing a white worm in the dream indicates success in projects, purchases and sales. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the white worm he sees in front of him has died or changed color, It means the loss or death of a relative. White worms in a dream symbolize hypocrisy and hypocrisy in matters of religion and this world and are a sign that there are people trying to gain your trust in order to undermine you later. White worms in a dream are illegitimate children or the children of someone hostile to you. A white worm symbolizes Theft, bribery, and corruption, and also in abundance in a dream portends punishment or a bad outcome. White worms are signs of the loss of blessings, the disappearance of religion, and the spread of evil, as it has been shown that the dream of worms is evidence of foolishness and evil. If you dream that you are eating worms, then your dream means that someone is jealous of you. And he envies you, whether for livelihood, beauty, marriage, or any blessing he sees you experiencing. If you see that you are eating worms on your plate with food, this means that there is someone jealous of you and hiding evil from you. It is said that seeing worms in a dream is a sign of anxiety that you are suffering from It can also be a sign that you have enemies. If you see worms in your bed, this means that there are close enemies within your family. If you see worms coming out of a certain place on your body, this symbolizes that you will get rid of all the fears that are bothering you. Green worm in a dream It is a good omen because it indicates a new beginning on a certain level. Interpretation of seeing a worm - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about defecation by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about defecation: Stool is the waste that comes out of the body after food remains, and it is a harmful component that the body gets rid of on a daily basis. So what about the interpretation of a dream about defecation? It is a good omen for the fortuneteller and portends comfort and the end of worry, or portends other unwanted indicators in certain cases, such as seeing defecation in front of people, on clothes, or on the hand. We will deal with all of these cases. In detail in the lines of the article and presenting the most important opinions and interpretations of major scholars such as Ibn Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about defecation: Seeing feces in a dream includes many different cases in which the interpretation and meaning differ, as follows: In interpreting a dream about urination, scholars generally state that expelling something In the abdomen is an indication of the vagina and the healing of the body from ills, diseases and worries. While the interpretation of a dream about defecation, feces and a bad smell, may indicate money from an unreliable source. Seeing defecation and defecation in a place other than the bathroom may indicate an appropriate situation that the dreamer does not adapt to and feels With a psychological disorder. Overcoming feces in front of people in a man’s dream is a sign that his secrets will be revealed. Interpretation of the dream of defecation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of the dream of defecation that it is connoted and related to its smell, and accordingly we find the following interpretations: Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of defecation as a sign of comfort after Anguish and distress. Ibn Sirin says that feces that smell foul in a dream are evidence that money comes from injustice. Defecation in a rich man’s dream is evidence of multiple means of luxury, and in a poor man’s dream it is good news of the relief of his distress, the disappearance of his worries, and the coming of goodness. Ibn Sirin added that seeing A married man defecating in front of people in a dream indicates that he is a person who is not responsible for his home and reveals his secrets with his wife and reveals his secrets. Interpretation of a dream about defecation for a single woman. In interpreting a dream about defecation for a single woman, scholars provide good and desirable indicators, such as: Interpretation of a dream about defecation for single people generally indicates Good and good news. If a girl dreams that she is urinating in the toilet, she will get rid of everything that annoys and saddens her in her life, and this is evidence of covering up, and showing high morals and good behavior among people. A lot of defecation in a dream indicates the arrival of kindness and marriage to a well-off man. Interpretation of a dream of carrying a chair for a single woman: It has been said that the interpretation of a dream of carrying green feces for an unmarried woman indicates marriage to a man of good morals and religion. Whereas if a girl sees that she is touching foul-smelling feces in a dream, this may indicate that she has committed sins and wrong actions in her life and needs to Reviewing herself, getting closer to God, and staying away from disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about defecation for a married woman. Most interpretations of dreams about defecation for a married woman may indicate unpleasant meanings, such as: If a married woman sees that she is relieving herself in a dream in a place other than the toilet, then she is revealing the secrets of her home to everyone and allowing them to interfere. In the privacy of her affairs, which may cause disagreements between her. And her husband. To dream of a wife defecating her husband in a public place means that she...
